languages.text: "Вот бы взглянуть на звездные чудеса... Хоть одним глазком!"

traits.locale_text: "Вот бы взглянуть на звездные чудеса... Хоть одним глазком!"

languages.text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"
languages.original_text: "Вот бы взглянуть на звездные чудеса... Хоть одним глазком!"

traits.locale_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"
"If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"
"If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"
"If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

languages.text: 「星のすごさを、せめて一瞬でもこの目で見られればな…」
languages.original_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

traits.locale_text: 「星のすごさを、せめて一瞬でもこの目で見られればな…」

languages.text: «Ojalá pudiese contemplar las maravillas de las estrellas... ¡aunque fuese solo por un instante!».
languages.original_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá pudiese contemplar las maravillas de las estrellas... ¡aunque fuese solo por un instante!».

languages.text: “要是我也能亲眼看到群星的奇迹就好了……哪怕只有片刻也好！”
languages.original_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

traits.locale_text: “要是我也能亲眼看到群星的奇迹就好了……哪怕只有片刻也好！”

languages.text: "Könnte ich die Wunder der Sterne doch nur erfassen ... wenigstens für einen kurzen Moment!"
languages.original_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

traits.locale_text: "Könnte ich die Wunder der Sterne doch nur erfassen ... wenigstens für einen kurzen Moment!"

languages.text: « Si seulement je pouvais admirer les étoiles… ne serait-ce qu'un instant ! »
languages.original_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

traits.locale_text: « Si seulement je pouvais admirer les étoiles… ne serait-ce qu'un instant ! »

languages.text: "Keşke yıldızların mucizelerine tanık olabilseydim... Bir anlığına bile olsa!"
languages.original_text: "If only I could behold the wonders of the stars… even for a moment!"

traits.locale_text: "Keşke yıldızların mucizelerine tanık olabilseydim... Bir anlığına bile olsa!"
